Key Match Events: Nitish Kumar Reddy hit seven maximums and four boundaries in only 34 balls
Rinku Singh and Nitish Kumar Reddy put up a crucial 108-run stand for the fourth wicket
Arshdeep Singh claimed Parvez Hossain Emonâ€™s wicket in his next over
Washington Sundar got Najmul Hossain Shanto out
Sanju Samson hit back-to-back boundaries off Mehidy Hasan Miraz in the first over
Miscellaneous Highlights: India scored an imposing 221 for nine and then stopped their opponents at 135 for nine
Nitish Kumar Reddy and Rinku Singh sizzled with both bat and ball
India took an unassailable 2-0 lead in the three-match series
Others: Bangladesh started the innings with some spin in the form of Mehidy Hasan Miraz and Sanju Samson punished the off-spinner with back-to-back boundaries to plunder 15 runs from the first over
